content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name:
      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0012
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when variable type does not match IG Type (for domains
  in IG) or Model Type (custom domains)
Outcome:
  Message: Variable type does not match IG Type or Model Type
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check against Define XML
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0012
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Using SDTM-specified data types for all variables
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item:
                Section: 3.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: Note that the SDTM type specified in this document
                  is either character or numeric, as these are the only types supported
                  by SAS v.5 transport files.]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: '2.1'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when variable type does not match IG Type (for domains in IG) or Model Type (custom domains)

Outcome.Message: Variable type does not match IG Type or Model Type

json.Rule_Type: Variable Metadata Check against Define XML

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Using SDTM-specified data types for all variables
Note that the SDTM type specified in this document is either character or numeric, as these are the only types supported by SAS v.5 transport files.]
